thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1869
thread.title: Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text: This was my first experience using FlightHub. Lots of hidden fees, charges and corrections. My final price was $250 higher than the starting price.. I would have been better off going with an airline directly! It was difficult understanding the customer service representative, when I called for clarification on the increases, even though I could tell she was trying to help. I doubt I'll be using them again.
